thread.title: OMG! Shruti Haasan Rejected Thala Ajith's Famous Biryani?
thread.title_full: OMG! Shruti Haasan Rejected Thala Ajith's Famous Biryani?

title: OMG! Shruti Haasan Rejected Thala Ajith's Famous Biryani?
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
While everyone in the entire Tamil film industry would love to taste the most hyped about Biryani that Thala Ajith usually treats the crew members working on his films with, Shruti Haasan , the heroine of Vedalam has rejected the offer by saying no to his sumptuous repast. 
It is said that when Ajith served Biryani to everyone on the sets of his upcoming flick Vedalam , the Puli girl was the only one not to taste his signature dish citing diet as the reason. 
Though Shruti belongs to a Brahmin family, she is a non-vegetarian by choice. But since the chassy looking actress is on a strict diet regimen she decided not to taste Ajith's Biryani, thereby showing off her will power, according to a report. 
Meanwhile, it is being said that Shruti has been made to involve in some high-octane action sequences in Vedalam . If certain speculations are to be believed, her fans might get to see her ride some of the most sophisticated superbikes around in the film.
